solution_line_template: Hallie works a total of {hours_monday} + {hours_tuesday} + {hours_wednesday} = <<{hours_monday}+{hours_tuesday}+{hours_wednesday}={total_hours_worked}>>{total_hours_worked} hours
For her hourly pay, she earns {total_hours_worked} * ${hourly_rate} = $<<{total_hours_worked}*{hourly_rate}={hourly_pay}>>{hourly_pay}
In tips, she receives a total of ${tips_monday} + ${tips_tuesday} + ${tips_wednesday} = $<<{tips_monday}+{tips_tuesday}+{tips_wednesday}={total_tips}>>{total_tips}
The total amount of money Hallie earns is ${hourly_pay} + ${total_tips} = $<<{hourly_pay}+{total_tips}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}
